title: The Greek Playboy's Girl
description: "She should trust her heart and follow what it wants. It’s better to love then lost than never love at all, right?” Still mourning the death of her fiancé, the thought of falling in love again overwhelms Adrianna Valdez. After all, they just got engaged when he encountered the fatal accident. Now, she spends her time with her godson, whose birthday is coming up soon. Here she meets a shipping magnate, Damien Doukas. Famed not only for his business prowess, he is also a known womanizer and party animal. When he has to help prepare the birthday party of his godson, he meets a girl that captures his full attention. The only problem is she thinks he is the most detestable man in the world. Damien can't stand being ignored, and Adrianna can't stand arrogant men. But what if something was happening outside of them that would keep bringing them together? Can two people who have been avoiding love for the longest time find it again? Find out in this billionaire romance that'll definitely leave you with an HEA!
author: Cheryl F.M.
